languages.text: Судя по следам на теле, этот несчастный ксенос, сшитый из нескольких особей одного вида, самолично вырвал из своей грудной клетки три модифицированных эльдарских сердца.

traits.locale_text: Судя по следам на теле, этот несчастный ксенос, сшитый из несколькиз особоей одного вида, самолично вырвал из своей грудной клетки три модифицированных эльдарских сердца.

languages.text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sewn together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.
languages.original_text: Судя по следам на теле, этот несчастный ксенос, сшитый из нескольких особей одного вида, самолично вырвал из своей грудной клетки три модифицированных эльдарских сердца.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sown together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.
Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sown together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.
Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sown together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.
Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sown together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.
Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sown together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.

languages.text: A juzgar por las marcas de su cuerpo, este desdichado xenos fue creado cosiendo partes de distintos individuos de la misma especie, y luego se arrancó tres corazones Aeldari modificados de su propio pecho.
languages.original_text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sewn together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por las marcas de su cuerpo, este desdichado xenos fue creado cosiendo partes de distintos individuos de la misma especie, y luego se arrancó tres corazones Aeldari modificados de su propio pecho.

languages.text: 体の跡から判断するに、この不幸なゼノには同じ種族の複数の個体から縫い合わされたのち、その胸から改造された３つのアエルダリの心臓が引き抜かれたようだ。
languages.original_text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sewn together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.

traits.locale_text: 体の跡から判断するに、この不幸なゼノには同じ種族の複数の個体から縫い合わされたのち、その胸から改造された３つのアエルダリの心臓が引き抜かれたようだ。

languages.text: 从它身上的痕迹来看，这只不幸的生物是由数个异形的肢体拼接而成的。在它的胸口处，三颗经过改造的艾达灵族心脏暴露在外。
languages.original_text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sewn together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.

traits.locale_text: 从它身上的痕迹来看，这只不幸的生物是由数个异形的肢体拼接而成的。在它的胸口处，三颗经过改造的艾达灵族心脏暴露在外。

languages.text: À en juger par les marques sur le corps, ce malheureux xénos a été constitué à partir de plusieurs individus de la même espèce, puis il a arraché trois cœurs aeldaris modifiés de sa propre poitrine.
languages.original_text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sewn together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par les marques sur le corps, ce malheureux xénos a été constitué à partir de plusieurs individus de la même espèce, puis il a arraché trois cœurs aeldaris modifiés de sa propre poitrine.

languages.text: Seinem malträtierten Körper nach zu urteilen wurde dieser unglückliche Xenos aus mehreren Individuen derselben Spezies zusammengenäht und riss sich danach drei modifizierte Aeldari-Herzen aus der Brust heraus.
languages.original_text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sewn together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.

traits.locale_text: Seinem malträtierten Körper nach zu urteilen wurde dieser unglückliche Xenos aus mehreren Individuen derselben Spezies zusammengenäht und riss sich danach drei modifizierte Aeldari-Herzen aus der Brust heraus.

languages.text: Bu zavallı zeno, bedenindeki izlere bakılacak olursa aynı türden pek çok bireyle birleştirilerek dikilmiş ve ardından şekli değiştirilmiş üç Aeldari kalbini kendi göğüs kafesinden söküp atmış.
languages.original_text: Judging by the marks on its body, this unfortunate xenos was sewn together from several individuals of the same species and then ripped three modified Aeldari hearts out of its own chest.

traits.locale_text: Bu zavallı zeno, bedenindeki izlere bakılacak olursa aynı türden pek çok bireyle birleştirilerek dikilmiş ve ardından şekli değiştirilmiş üç Aeldari kalbini kendi göğüs kafesinden söküp atmış.
